title: 15-year-old shot on Glenside Road in Cleveland, no suspects
content:
CLEVELAND, OH (WOIO) -
A 15-year-old teen was shot in the leg in Cleveland Tuesday night. The incident happened on the 14000 block of Glenside road.
The teen said he was walking when he heard several gunshots, then realized he had been shot. He was transported to the hospital.
Police are still looking for the shooter.
